name: ZigZag Fidget
description:
ZigZag Fidget    

Here goes yet another endless casual game into the market! 

Except that you wont even last for a time good enough to call it an endless game :P 

ZigZag Fidget is  a simple ( definitely NOT! ) game that puts you in control of a fidget stick which anyway, will be mostly controlled by some crazy laws of physics rather than you. Guide your stick on a challenging ZigZag path and along the way, you are guaranteed to experience some stunning eye candy , some thrill, many 'OH NO' moments, a lot of frustration and an even greater ADDICTION!

We look forward to your reviews and feedback as this will help us kickstart our wonderful journey of making amusing games :)

The game is already live on the Play Store and will soon be uploaded on the App Store as well.
